item.title: Dharam add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Dharam add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dharam add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "As your lover describes you, so you are." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Dharam add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "One should never trust a woman who tells one her real age. A woman who would tell one that would tell one anything." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Dharam add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Many marriages would be better if the husband and wife clearly understood that they're on the same side. " -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Dharam add a quote by Nawal El Saadawi
item.description: "Yet not for a single moment did I have any doubts about my own integrity and honour as a woman. I knew that my profession had been invented by men, and that men were in control of both our worlds, the one on earth, and the one in heaven. That men force women to sell their bodies at a price, and that the lowest paid body is that of a wife. All women are prostitutes of one kind or another." -- Nawal El Saadawi

item.title: Dharam add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Dharam add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dharam add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein
